name: Cloud Chopper
description:
Become rich by gathering all the resources you can find in this new world!
Forage wood, stone, and plants. Rebuild your village to unlock special buildings. Upgrade your tools to discover strong power-ups.
Can you explore the world of Cloud Chopper and find all its secrets?

• Upgrade your tools and your character to become powerful
• Sell resources to buy new land for your kingdom!
• Collect all resource types, tools, and secrets to beat the game!
_
Visit us at: http://www.ludigames.com/

Privacy Policy: http://www.ludigames.com/privacy-notice
